short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat about the content of the web page you're currently visiting with other visitors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Chat About you can discuss in real-time about the article you're currently reading, the video you're currently watching, the product you're currently reviewing, or any other content existing in the web page you're currently visiting.
